Key roles Responsibilities:
       In my current role I am responsible for managing Preventive
Maintenance           Breakdown  maintenance  of  entire  production
Machine, HVAC, & UTILITY Area and Calibration Documentation.Job profile: 
Responsible for all the aspect preventive maintenance and breakdown
maintenance of utility equipment like chiller, boiler, air compressor, 
cooling tower.
Basic knowledge of chillers and air compressor. 
Responsible for maintenance of all production machines in 
manufacturing area having Machines RMG, FBD, Blender, 
Compression, Coating & packing area like strip packing machine & 
blister packing machine. 
Responsible for Operation & Maintenance of HVAC system and 
Validation of HVAC.
Handling routine plant maintenance and equipment &Handling 
equipment’s spares.
Documentation Related to Engineering Activities Such As:
Maintaining Documents of daily,monthly,yearly Check of all 
equipment Audit & Company reference planning &execution of 
plant preventive &break maintenance 
Maintain the building maintenance records& EHS records.
Co –ordination with external party, contactors.
Key skills:  
Having knowledge of HVAC system 
Handling of Calibration, PM. & Maintain its Records
Ability to perform better in competitive atmosphere
Possess strong skills in project planning and monitoring progress in 
initial stage of the project.
